beats: A trolley with a wonky wheel squeaks toward the produce aisle.
Jemima debates the price of organic carrots versus standard fare.
A sudden announcement promises double loyalty points on tinned beans.
At the checkout, the scanner beeps an unexpected total.
questions: If Jemima buys 8 tins of beans at £1.25 each and receives a 20% discount, what is the total cost?
The supermarket loyalty scheme grants 3 points per pound spent; how many points does Jemima earn on a £52.00 shop?
